A sermon against neutrality whether as to the main substantials of religion or matters of injoyned order / preached at the visitation of the Reverend Doctour Cary, Arch-deacon of Exon, at St. Marie's Exon, on Friday in Easter Week, 1663 by E.W. Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.
[4], 51 p.
Printed by J.M. for J. Martyn & J. Allestry, London : 1663.
Dedication signed: Edw. Wetenhall. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

[4], 51 p.
Printed by J.M. for J. Martyn & J. Allestry, London : 1663.
